text: "Play on Love" is a 1975 song by Jefferson Starship. It was the second of two singles issued from their Red Octopus LP. The song reached number 49 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100 and number 47 on Cash Box during January 1976. In Canada, "Play on Love" spent two weeks at number 46. ==Chart history== {| class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (1975-76) !align="left"|Peak position |- |Canada RPM Top Singles | style="text-align:center;"|46 |- |U.S. Billboard Hot 100Joel Whitburn's Top Pop Singles 1955–1990 - | style="text- align:center;"|49 |- |U.S. Cash Box Top 100 | style="text-align:center;"|47 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:Jefferson Starship songs Category:1975 songs Category:1975 singles Category:Songs written by Grace Slick Category:RCA Records singles
title: Play on Love
